text: Brigitte Peskine (30 December 1951 - 5 September 2020) was a French author and screenwriter. She was born in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France. Her first novel was titled Le Ventriloqu and was published in 1985. She was known for writing the screenplays for the French sitcoms Plus belle la vie and Candice Renoir. Peskine died on 5 September 2020 in Paris, aged 68. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French novelists Category:French screenwriters Category:Writers from Hauts-de-Seine Category:People from Neuilly-sur-Seine
title: Brigitte Peskine
